name: They Must...
description:
INFO:

This game is my submission for GMTK 2021 Game Jame.

In this puzzle game you control all pieces simultaneously, you cant move only one piece. Therefore it suits the theme of the jam "Joined together".  Each piece has goal: die, live, stay together with other piece or kill anouther piece.

The game has 19 levels with increasing difficulty and more elements being added to the mix.

I will probably record and link full playthrough video so you can skip the levels if you dont want to complete them

CREDITS:

All the code, as well as idea, game design and level design was done by me during the jam time. I used unity's URP 2D Lightning packege to get better graphics and i also used game save/load asset from unity's asset store.

Most of the sprites were also made by me, although I used icons from https://game-icons.net/  

As for the music, game contains 3 compositions, one of witch is the games original soundtrack, here is all the music and its authors:

  • TheyMustOST - Emache
  • Space Riddle - Chiphead64
  • Dark Alley - HeatleyBros
